overview: It is a daring idea: to grow food from old mattresses in a desolate camp at the edge of a war zone. When a refugee scientist meets two quirky professors, they must confront their own catastrophes - and make a garden grow.  Short film now streaming on Waterbear.com.
tagline: It is a daring idea: to grow food from old mattresses in a desolate camp at the edge of a war zone.
title: The Catastrophe Garden
